[`protocol OS_ar_anchor`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_anchor)The identity, location, and orientation of an object in world space.[`protocol OS_ar_trackable_anchor`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_trackable_anchor)An anchor that can gain and lose its tracking state over the course of a session.[`protocol OS_ar_authorization_result`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_authorization_result)An authorization result.[`protocol OS_ar_authorization_results`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_authorization_results)A collection of authorization results.[`protocol OS_ar_data_provider`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_data_provider)A source of live data from ARKit.[`protocol OS_ar_device_anchor`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_device_anchor)The position and orientation of Apple Vision Pro.[`protocol OS_ar_error`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_error)An error reported by ARKit.[`protocol OS_ar_data_providers`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_data_providers)A source of live data from ARKit.[`protocol OS_ar_geometry_element`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_geometry_element)A container for vertex indices of lines or triangles.[`protocol OS_ar_geometry_source`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_geometry_source)A container for geometrical vector data.[`protocol OS_ar_hand_anchor`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_hand_anchor)A hand’s position in a person’s surroundings.[`protocol OS_ar_hand_skeleton`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_hand_skeleton)[`protocol OS_ar_hand_tracking_provider`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_hand_tracking_provider)A source of live data about the position of a person’s hands and hand joints.[`protocol OS_ar_image_tracking_configuration`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_image_tracking_configuration)[`protocol OS_ar_plane_detection_configuration`](/documentation/arkit/os_ar_plane_detection_configuration)
